General.Name: Zhejiang Dingli Mach Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Dingli Machinery Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, manufacture, sale, and service of various types of intelligent aerial work platforms in China and internationally. The company offers straight boom type and articulated boom type products. It also provides scissor aerial and mast aerial work platforms. The company's products are used in industrial, commercial, construction, engineering, building decoration, warehousing and logistics, petrochemical industry, and ship production and maintenance, as well as special industries, such as State Grid, nuclear power plants, high-speed rail, airports, tunnels, etc. It also exports its products to approximately 80 countries and regions. Zhejiang Dingli Machinery Co.,Ltd was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Deqing, China.
General.Address: No.1255 Baiyun South Road, Deqing, China
